ComicInfo.Summary:
A UFO crashes near Pine City and Probe is sent to investigate. The natives led by Dutch Abe want to destroy it.
Judge Dredd's identical clone, his "brother" Rico, returns from the penal colony on Titan, where he has served a 20-year sentence for corruption and murder. Now he seeks revenge on Dredd, who turned him in. In the subsequent gun fight, Judge Dredd draws faster and Rico is killed.
ComicInfo.Tags: Bill Savage,Buck Dollar,Dan Dare,Jake K. Falmuth,Judge Dredd,Judges of Mega-City One,MACH 1,Maria,Mega-City One,Peter Silk,Rico Dredd,Shako,Tharg the Mighty,The Great Bear
